au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=14m_L2=2m_central_rheo_oct_2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength',5.0) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200, 0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g2 driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -162.74) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.94) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.01)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(43, 0) driveBsz(260)
